summary: This Mod lets you equip up to two rings at the same time.
descriptionHtml:
Name: TwoRings
Version: 1.3.1
Date: 3/9/2013
Category: Items, Objects and Clothes
Author: Dienes

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge.png[/img][/url][/center]

Description
===========
This is a simple mod that lets you equip up to two rings. Sadly only one ring will display on your character at a time and that is somewhat glitchy.

Version 1.2 is a rewrite that does not use any other biped object parts for the second ring. It should be compatible with any mod that doesn't change the base ring behavior.

Unfortunately I can't figure out how to make you able to equip two of the exact same ring. 

Sometimes a quest or other mod may break TwoRings. A console command will reset it. With no rings equipped open the console and type "set dht_TwoRingsReset to 1" (without the quotes) and then put on and take off 1 ring.

If that doesn't work remove your ring and stop and start the quest. Open the console and type "help dht_ringswapquest" it will give you the quest number XX000d62 (with XX replaced with where tworings is in your load order) type stopquest and the number you got. Then Startquest and the same number.

Requirements
============
You must have SKSE.

Install
=======
1. Use ModOrganizer, its great.
1b. Or extract the archive to your skyrim directory and enable it in your data files.

Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the TwoRings.esp file.
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

Incompatibility
===============
This mod should not conflict with other mods unless they change the vanilla ring behavior.
Hircine's quest sometimes gums things up. See above on how to reset the mod.


History
=======

1.3.1 3/9/2013 - fixed papyrus error log spam, added .seq file since tes5edit suggested it needed one.
1.3, 2/25/2013 - bugfix for removed rings not allowing you to add a different second ring
1.2, 10/14/2012 - no conflict rewrite
1.1a, 10/14/2012 - compatibility version
1.1, 10/14/2012 - working version
1.0, 10/14/2012 - Initial release.

Contact
=======
Dienes on nexusmods.com
LtSmash on SA

Credits
=======
Thanks for the SKSE team for making this possible and to the creationkit.com wiki contributors.

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that
you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod.

Consider checking out my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32339]Lootification[/url] Automatically enchant and distribute mod added weapons and armor.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33902]Transmogrification - Copy Armor Stats[/url] Look stylish and have progression.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33411]Dienes Durability Damager[/url] Durability for Skyrim. Also includes tempered/damaged items for npcs.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33963]Crafting cloud storage and retrieval - General Stores[/url] Access General Stores storage from any crafting station.
